description: This file defines the interface for report-related functionalities in a Wi-Fi management system. It includes function declarations for starting, configuring, initializing, and deinitializing reporting tasks, as well as pushing reports related to clients, surveys, and neighbors to a data plane processor (DPP). The file also references external modules such as 'sm_cache.h' and 'wifi_base.h'.

methods.name: sm_report_start_task
methods.description: Starts a reporting task with specified stats type, application context, and request state, using provided configuration.

methods.name: sm_report_config_task
methods.description: Configures a reporting task for the specified application and request state with given configuration.

methods.name: sm_report_deinit
methods.description: Deinitializes reporting for the specified application, releasing resources.

methods.name: sm_report_init
methods.description: Initializes reporting for the specified application, setting up necessary resources.

methods.name: sm_report_send_to_qm_cb
methods.description: Callback for sending report data to the Quality Manager or data plane.

methods.name: survey_report_counter_publish_cb
methods.description: Callback for publishing survey report counters.

methods.name: sm_client_report_push_to_dpp
methods.description: Pushes client report data to the data plane processor (DPP) for a given cache, frequency band, and channel.

methods.name: sm_survey_report_push_to_dpp
methods.description: Pushes survey report data to DPP for a given cache, frequency band, survey type, report type, and report counter.

methods.name: sm_neighbor_report_push_to_dpp
methods.description: Pushes neighbor report data to DPP for a given cache, frequency band, survey type, and report type.
